description: This file initializes an Agent with a Gemini model and demonstrates how to generate and print a response to a prompt, specifically for streaming output.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a language model, capable of running prompts and printing responses.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A Google model class used for generating responses.

methods.name: Agent.__init__
methods.description: Constructor for the Agent class, initializes with a model and optional parameters.

methods.name: Agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt with the agent, optionally streaming the response.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Prints the response generated by the agent for a given prompt.

methods.name: Gemini.__init__
methods.description: Constructor for the Gemini model class, initializes with specific model parameters.
